doc.title: Empire III: Armageddon
doc.plot: The final episode of the Empire Science Fiction Adventure trilogy reveals a world in chaos. In this desperate society you have but one mission: to find the Empress and destroy the Empire. But first, you must survive the City, defy the lethal snares of the ghetto, and escape the Arena's bloody sport. You'll meet vandals, racketeers, prostitutes, beggars, preachers and Imperial guards. With each encounter, you'll stake your life in a gamble against fate. And if you escape the City, new treachery awaits in the brooding Wilderness. Your cunning may see you through, but what perils lie within the Great Pyramid?
